definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
paternal aunt/husband's sister/husband's mother (old)/nun/for the time being (literary)

pinyin: qi1 da4 gu1 ba1 da4 yi2

sentences.english: Here, my girl, take the candle and go there.
sentences.chinese: 大姑娘，帶支蠟燭去瞧瞧。

sentences.english: Here an event occurred to Mademoiselle Gillenormand the elder,-- an idea struck her.
sentences.chinese: 到此，吉諾曼大姑娘感到有事可做了，她有了個想法。

sentences.english: She has turned into a slim and graceful girl in the years we have been apart.
sentences.chinese: 幾年沒見她已經長成亭亭玉立的大姑娘了。

sentences.english: When she grew up to be a beautiful girl, many persons came to her home begging for marrying her.
sentences.chinese: 等她出落成楚楚動人的大姑娘時，前來求親的人很多。

sentences.english: Keep-fit mania has hit some of the girls in the office.
sentences.chinese: 健身熱潮曾經席捲了辦公室外很多大姑娘。

sentences.english: Last year my aunt gave me a black and white spotted puppy - a lovely dalmation.
sentences.chinese: 去年我從大姑家抱來了一隻黑白相間的小花狗。

sentences.english: Very soon Sha Sha grew up into a beautiful young lady.
sentences.chinese: 轉眼，莎莎已經出落成一個漂亮的大姑娘了。

sentences.english: Many around the woman, all Aunt Daisow.
sentences.chinese: 周圍女人不少，全是大姑大嫂。

sentences.english: The whole family know great nephew and I the most eccentric aunt most iron.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都知道大侄兒和我這個最偏心的大姑最鐵。

sentences.english: She's grown into a very beautiful young lady.
sentences.chinese: 她已經長成一個漂亮的大姑娘了。

sentences.english: Small US has become pretty girl.
sentences.chinese: 小美已經出落成了大姑娘。

sentences.english: My aunt in his heart is sometimes more than mom.
sentences.chinese: 大姑在他心中的位置有時會超過媽媽。

sentences.english: With time passing, they have grown into big boys and big girls.
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的流逝，他們都長成大小夥子和大姑娘了。

sentences.english: The ratio of boys to girls has gotten less and less.
sentences.chinese: 小夥子們與大姑娘的比例越來越小。

sentences.english: Don't sweat Vanessa; she's an adult.
sentences.chinese: 別爲溫內莎擔心，她已經是個大姑娘了。

definition: grandfather's sister/sister of a woman's father-in-law
wife of older male cousin via female line
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
father's sister's husband/husband of paternal aunt/uncle
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
